name: Desert Pavilion Chronicle
four_pc: When Charged Attacks hit opponents, the equipping character's Normal Attack SPD will increase by 10% while Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG will increase by 40% for 15s.

goblet.name: Defender of the Enchanting Dream
goblet.description: An ancient golden cup that is both marvelously and luxuriously wrought. Murmurings can be heard within its empty innards.

plume.name: End of the Golden Realm
plume.description: A crystal-clear artificial feather that is one of the legacies of an ancient human realm. The cries of soaring eagles are also sealed within.

circlet.name: Legacy of the Desert High-Born
circlet.description: Earrings made from amber gold that shines with a strange light.

flower.name: The First Days of the City of Kings
flower.description: An artificial flower that shimmers with a strange light. If you incline your ear to it, you can vaguely hear charming laughter issuing from within.

sands.name: Timepiece of the Lost Path
sands.description: An ancient mechanical clock. The Jinni fragments continue to emit light at its center and vibrate ever so slightly, as if to say something...
